query:
SELECT DISTINCT
                u.id         as "user_id",
                u.first_name as "first_name",
                u.last_name  as "last_name",
                u.username   as "username"
            FROM shared_tasks st
            INNER JOIN users u ON u.id = st.assignee_user_id
            WHERE st.project_id = $1
            AND st.assignee_user_id IS NOT NULL
